Our city is unrecognizable and will be unrecognizable without real leadership the mayor is completely incapable of, I worry so much for my city

We dont talk about it enough but I remember riding the subway in early march and being the ONLY person with a mask in a crowded train and our mayor was downplaying the threat on Twitter. The city should have been shut down.
We really are not spending enough energy talking about how de blasio has been the worst mayor I have ever seen in my lifetime and New Yorkers are dying because of his incompetence

In NY they're like "Here's lettuce and dressing. Salad." and in SF they're like "Here's our ahi tuna, and some sprouts, and feta cheese..."
